page.title: The Ultimate Google Ads Report Template (Better than Excel)
page.metaDescription: Download the best Google Ads Report Template for 2026. Stop using static Excel sheets and start using live, automated dashboards with Flipika.
page.h1:
Stop downloading static templates.
Start using Live Dashboards.
page.subtitle: Excel and PDF templates are obsolete. They break, they lie, and they are ugly. Switch to Flipika's Live Template: always up-to-date, interactive, and beautiful.
page.comparisonTitle: Why Flipika beats Excel & Looker Studio
page.hookTitle: Why this beats standard Looker Studio Templates
page.costTitle: The Hidden Cost of Manual Reporting
page.costSubtitle: Still using Excel or PowerPoint? Here is what it really costs you.
page.metricsSubtitle: The metrics that matter have changed. Are you tracking the right ones?

executive.title: The Executive Summary
executive.description: Perfect for C-level reporting. Focuses on high-level KPIs like ROAS, total spend, and conversion value. Designed to answer the question: 'Is my money being spent wisely?' in 10 seconds.

ecommerce.title: The E-commerce ROAS Tracker
ecommerce.description: Granular product performance, shopping campaign analysis, and revenue attribution. Drill down by product category, item ID, or location to identify your most profitable segments.

agency.title: The Agency Overview
agency.description: Manage multiple clients? Get a unified view of all your accounts performance in one place. Spot underperforming accounts instantly and allocate your time where it matters most.

speed.title: Blazing Fast Loader
speed.description: Looker Studio can take 10s+ to load. Flipika loads in milliseconds thanks to our optimized caching layer.

branding.title: White Label Perfection
branding.description: No 'Google' logo everywhere. Your brand, your colors, your domain.

stability.title: It Just Works
stability.description: No more random connector disconnects or broken visualisations.

time.title: 10+ Hours / Month
time.description: The average account manager spends 10 hours per month just gathering data and formatting spreadsheets.

errors.title: Human Errors
errors.description: One copy-paste error can ruin a client relationship. Automated pipes never make mistakes.

opportunity.title: Missed Insights
opportunity.description: While you are fixing font sizes in Excel, you are not analyzing why your CPA increased yesterday.

roas.title: ROAS (Return on Ad Spend)
roas.description: The holy grail of e-commerce. Don't just track clicks, track how much revenue every dollar generates.

cpa.title: CPA (Cost Per Acquisition)
cpa.description: For lead generation, keeping your CPA stable while scaling volume is the ultimate challenge.

imp_share.title: Search Lost IS (Budget)
imp_share.description: Are you losing customers because your budget is too low? This metric tells you exactly how much opportunity you are leaving on the table.

faq.q1: Is this Google Ads report template really free?
faq.a1: Yes, you can use our standard templates for free. We also offer premium features for power users, but the core templates are free forever.
faq.q2: Can I export the report to PDF?
faq.a2: Absolutely. While we encourage live sharing for interactivity, you can generate a pixel-perfect PDF report in one click.
faq.q3: How does Flipika connect to my Google Ads account?
faq.a3: We use the official Google Ads API. It's secure, fast, and read-only. We never modify your campaigns, we just visualize the performance.
faq.q4: Is it better than Looker Studio?
faq.a4: Looker Studio is powerful but slow and hard to maintain. Flipika is built for speed and aesthetics. If you want client-ready reports without the headache, Flipika is better.
